settings.subscribe_intro: Get the latest updates on new products and upcoming sales

meta.description: Supermarket Yellow is a responsive theme, UI/UX optimized for mobile. Built with Stencil. All features are customiziable in Theme Editor. You can enable Left Navigation layout across all pages. Switch between Mega Menu or Accordion Menu or Flyout Menu. New / Bestselling / Featured products support loading more products without leaving the home page. Showing products by categories on the home page, possibly setting the categories in Theme Editor. Display marketing banners in different positions on the home page, sidebar, category pages, product pages, brand pages. There are many useful features for wholesale merchants like Bulk Order, Search products in category, Products Frequently Bought Together, Vertical categories menu, Brands list. Speed up your website speed with Instant Load feature, it predicts and preloads the web pages which user may view next, display the next pages instantly. Changing fonts, colors easily in Theme Editor without coding required. Supermarket Yellow is ideal for supermarket, gorcery, wholesale, b2c/b2b marketplace, large store, online shopping mall selling electronics, furniture, home appliances, toys, automative parts and more.

Supermarket Blue is a responsive theme, UI/UX optimized for mobile. Built with Stencil. All features are customiziable in Theme Editor. You can enable Left Navigation layout across all pages. Switch between Mega Menu or Accordion Menu or Flyout Menu. New / Bestselling / Featured products support loading more products without leaving the home page. Showing products by categories on the home page, possibly setting the categories in Theme Editor. Display marketing banners in different positions on the home page, sidebar, category pages, product pages, brand pages. There are many useful features for wholesale merchants like Bulk Order, Search products in category, Products Frequently Bought Together, Vertical categories menu, Brands list. Speed up your website speed with Instant Load feature, it predicts and preloads the web pages which user may view next, display the next pages instantly. Supermarket Blue is ideal for supermarket, large store, wholesale, b2b/b2c marketplace, online shopping mall, grocery, selling electronics, fashion, furniture, home appliances, toys, automative and more. This design is full responsive, clean, and ready for a wide range of online stores.

Supermarket Pink is a responsive theme, UI/UX optimized for mobile. Built with Stencil. All features are customiziable in Theme Editor. You can enable Left Navigation layout across all pages. Switch between Mega Menu or Accordion Menu or Flyout Menu. New / Bestselling / Featured products support loading more products without leaving the home page. Showing products by categories on the home page, possibly setting the categories in Theme Editor. Display marketing banners in different positions on the home page, sidebar, category pages, product pages, brand pages. There are many useful features for wholesale merchants like Bulk Order, Search products in category, Products Frequently Bought Together, Vertical categories menu, Brands list. Speed up your website speed with Instant Load feature, it predicts and preloads the web pages which user may view next, display the next pages instantly. Changing fonts, colors easily in Theme Editor without coding required. Supermarket Pink is ideal for large store, online shopping mall, wholesale b2b/b2c marketplace selling fashion, shoes, eyewears, cosmetics & beauty, perfume, fragrance, and products for women.

Supermarket Modern is a responsive theme, UI/UX optimized for mobile. Built with Stencil. All features are customiziable in Theme Editor. You can enable Left Navigation layout across all pages. Switch between Mega Menu or Accordion Menu or Flyout Menu. New / Bestselling / Featured products support loading more products without leaving the home page. Showing products by categories on the home page, possibly setting the categories in Theme Editor. Display marketing banners in different positions on the home page, sidebar, category pages, product pages, brand pages. There are many useful features for wholesale merchants like Bulk Order, Search products in category, Products Frequently Bought Together, Vertical categories menu, Brands list. Speed up your website speed with Instant Load feature, it predicts and preloads the web pages which user may view next, display the next pages instantly. Changing fonts, colors easily in Theme Editor without coding required. Supermarket Modern is ideal for large store, wholesale b2b/b2c marketplace or online shopping mall selling electronics, gadgets, high-tech products, automotive car parts. Inspired from Amazon, best use for large stores. Responsive, mobile friendly design. Google rich snippets, AMP ready.
